content.rendered:
My official Boards of Canada T-shirt has seen better days, so I decided to replace it with a BoC-inspired design of my own. I started with the Hexagon Sun theme and just ran with it. My design has just been accepted by the lovely folk at @cottonbureau. Get 'em while they're hot!

A photo posted by James Stiff (@jamesstiff) on Mar 9, 2016 at 3:31pm PST

Order now on Cotton Bureau

Update: Sorry! Cotton Bureau orders are now closed but fear not...

I've been absolutely blown away by the response. 65 shirts sold in just 14 days!

I've had a number of requests from friends here in the UK and further afield, asking if they can get their hands on this T-shirt. I'm currently working with an excellent printer here in Manchester to make this happen. I might even be able to offer a wider range of colour options.

I'll share more details in the coming weeks so if you don't want to miss the boat, get yourself on this here mailing list, sharpish!

Get T-shirt updates!
